HomePage.title: Expert in all types of legal cases
HomePage.title2: We are committed to providing the highest standards of legal services to protect the interests of our clients.

History.title: Our History
History.foundedText: was established in 2019, initially opening as
History.description: formed by a team of 3 expert lawyers and 1 professional legal execution staff. With a vision of providing comprehensive and highly professional legal expertise, we are dedicated to delivering end-to-end services. This ranges from in-depth legal consultation, analysis, planning, and dispute resolution to reviewing and drafting all types of business agreements, license applications, issuing debt collection notices, various certificates, and foreign document notarization. We also serve as legal counsel in civil, criminal, anti-corruption, administrative, and labor cases, as well as estate administrator appointments, asset tracing, and legal execution to ensure our clients receive the maximum benefit.

Vision.title: Vision
Vision.description: “Striving to be a leading law firm providing comprehensive, professional services to clients of all nationalities, to sustainably elevate the standards and image of the Thai legal profession to an international level.”
Vision.description1: Committed to delivering legal services covering all dimensions, from preventive strategies to complete dispute resolution and problem-solving. This includes consultation, contract drafting and review, litigation, as well as full-scale asset tracing and execution.
Vision.description2: Elevating the organization to become an international legal leader, with particular expertise in litigation and case management that emphasizes sharpness, accuracy, and full professional ethics.
Vision.description3: Standing firm as a strong and reliable legal partner to protect the interests and build sustainable success for clients of all nationalities with utmost sincerity.

AboutUs.help: We help our clients remain competitive in the evolving legal landscape
AboutUs.p1: was founded in 2019 by a group of 7 expert lawyers and 2 professional legal execution staff. With a vision committed to being a comprehensive and highly professional legal representative, we intend to deliver services covering everything from in-depth legal consultation, analysis, and preventive planning for potential future disputes, to reviewing and drafting all types of business agreements, processing complex licenses, and debt collection. Furthermore, we represent clients in civil, criminal, and labor cases, as well as in arbitration processes, including specialized expertise in asset tracing and legal execution to ensure the maximum benefit for our clients.
AboutUs.p2: With many years of accumulated legal experience, our legal team has built trust through expertise in various fields of law, particularly in complex civil, commercial, and criminal cases involving substantial asset values. Our outstanding ability to analyze difficult cases and strategize litigation meticulously and tightly at every step ensures that our services are highly effective, exceeding international standards, and capable of excellently protecting our clients' interests.
AboutUs.p3: We also adhere to the principle of equality and are committed to providing legal services to all clients with the highest professional ethics. We are ready to serve without discrimination based on race or background, because our primary goal is to be a widely accepted legal representative whose legal success is continuously recommended by word of mouth. This drives our company forward to become a leading international law firm standing firm on righteousness and justice.
